abstract: Yet Yahoo made it clear that the company remained open to a deal, as long as Microsoft sweetened its bid.
snippet: Yet Yahoo made it clear that the company remained open to a deal, as long as Microsoft sweetened its bid.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  After their top executives traded recriminations in an exchange of letters, Microsoft and Yahoo continued their stalemate, with Yahoo shareholders expected to play an increasingly large role in the takeover battle.

headline.main: Yahoo Answers Microsoft With Yet Another No
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Answers Microsoft Letter With Yet Another No

abstract: Microsoft delivered a threat to Yahoo over the weekend, indicating that if the search giant doesn’t start playing ball it may lower its offer and formally go hostile, there is plenty of speculation about whether or not Microsoft’s chief Steven Ballmer may be playing a game of chicken.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft delivered a threat to Yahoo over the weekend, indicating that if the search giant doesn’t start playing ball it may lower its offer and formally go hostile, there is plenty of speculation about whether or not Microsoft’s chief Steven Ballmer may be playing a game of chicken.

abstract: As Microsoft continues to press its takeover bid for Yahoo, Microsoft’s shareholders might be interested to know more about the deal-making history of Microsoft’s chief executive, Steven Ballmer.
lead_paragraph: As Microsoft continues to press its takeover bid for Yahoo, Microsoft’s shareholders might be interested to know more about the deal-making history of Microsoft’s chief executive, Steven Ballmer.

headline.main: Will Deal-Making Chiefs Ever Learn? Maybe.
